participant_1.background:
I want a home that is safe and comfortable for my family.
i like ford cars.
I'm proud of my work as an upholsterer and the commissions I've received from comic book artists.
I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
I love listening to music that reminds me of a time and place when things were simpler.

participant_2.background:
My eyes are too weak to see the world clearly, but my bones are strong enough to withstand a beating.
I wake up early in the morning, work on my book until noon, and then study for the police academy.
someday i with to become a famous animator and work for a big company like dreamworks.
i have never traveled outside of the united states.
I read a lot and spend my time on community activities.

content.text: I'm great! I'm an upholsterer. I do a lot of work for comic book artists. I'm also a musician. I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments! How are you?
I'm doing well! I'm an animator. I work on my book until noon, and then study for the police academy. I'm also a big reader and I spend my time on community activities.
Wow, that's impressive! I've never been able to draw or paint. I'm really into music. Do you have any favorite bands?
I love a lot of different kinds of music. I like old country music, classic rock, and some newer stuff too. I'm really into the band The Band.
I've never heard of them. What kind of music do they make?
They're a folk rock band. They're really good. You should check them out!
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
